title: Global Communications Manager, AppleCare
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. The people here at Apple don’t just craft products - they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. AppleCare is looking for a Strategic communications manager for our global Support Communications team.
description: As a strategist, you live and breathe planning. You know every communication has a goal. You are the master of crafting the vision and roadmap. You synthesize large amounts of information into key insights that are compelling. This role encompasses strategic planning and creative, innovative change management, all founded on an understanding of how engagement plans work. Project and process management skills are also essential.
preferred_qualifications: Masters or MBA, Contact Center experience
